formula: E.g.f.: 1/2 + exp(-4*x)/2 = (G(0)+1)/2 ; G(k) = 1 - 4*x/(2*k+1 - 2*x*(2*k+1)/(2*x - (k+1)/G(k+1))) ; (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 20 2011
